name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Font Size on Text Selection & Mouse Trail Effect

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mouse trail effect and drag show font size on the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A useful extension that tells you the size of the font by dragging and the residual effect that follows the mouse.
